attributes.action: Remove 10 day isolation & extreme costs in tests for the unvaccinated to travel.
attributes.additional_details:
Needs to be changed immediately, this is not acceptable. This is not a dictatorship, this is freedom of speech and to be basically be bullied into having a vaccine is lawfully not right. Some families cannot afford the costs added to be tested just to go see loved ones abroad. 
This is extremely unfair and bullying tactics to make people have a test drug put into their bodies.
attributes.background: This is far too extreme 10 days and the costs involved. People have a choice to get the vaccine or not. This pressure and obvious bullying tactic is not right is unlawful and a breach of our human rights.
